subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Adam Wainwright has gone 89 appearances, none of them against the Mets, since striking out Carlos Beltran to end the 2006 N.L.C.S.
snippet: Adam Wainwright has gone 89 appearances, none of them against the Mets, since striking out Carlos Beltran to end the 2006 N.L.C.S.
